title: Bloomberg Markets: Yardeni on Market 'White Swans'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Yardeni on Market 'White Swans'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Edward Yardeni President and Chief Investment Strategist Yardeni Research Discussing why he is not seeing any new and credible black-swan event that might trip up the current bull market in stocks. He says white swans typically outnumber black ones over time.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
